verbose_text: The MDA level and GSH / GSSG ratio were also measured as indices of oxidative damage and found that lipid peroxidation (MDA level) was increased whereas GSH / GSSG ratio was decreased by cisplatin injection; these changes were partially reversed by pretreatment with medium and high concentrations of BP121 (XREF_FIG).
evidence: GSSG ratio was decreased by cisplatin
